about_the_game:
Unlock expanded VRidge capabilities and enjoy playing your favorite regular PC games in full virtual reality!

With the GameWarp extension, you can enjoy any game on your mobile or cardboard VR headset, even if it wasn't originally designed for VR!

GameWarp offers even more when working in tandem with ReShade software. Turning any non-VR game into a full 3D experience.
